title: How do I enable a screen lock that must be unlocked using a PIN?
answer:
1. Go to Settings and touch Security > Screen lock > PIN. 

 2. Under Choose your PIN, enter a PIN. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112877)

 3. Repeat the PIN and touch OK. 

 When you power on the phone or press the power button to turn on the screen, the following unlock screen is displayed. Enter your PIN and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112878) to unlock the screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112879)
